main.title: Main menu
main.contactQuestion: 🤔 Here you can leave a message for the Author of this bot. Please try to try to express your minds fully within one message.
main.contactFailText: ❌ Your message not sent. Use only text please.
main.contactSuccessText: 📬 Your message has been delivered, thank you!

bots.title: Manage bots
bots.addSuccessText: ✅ Bot ${botName} is added, now you can add channels and sources

sourcesList.title: Sources of ${channelName}
sourcesList.addRssQuestion: Enter name of new source and URL separated by space
sourcesList.invalidSourceName: ❌ Invalid source name "${sourceName}", it must be beetwen 3-32 chars length
sourcesList.invalidSourceUrl: ❌ Can't get source URL from your answer
sourcesList.invalidSourceRecords: ❌ Can't parse records from your URL "${url}"

channel.title: Manage channel
channel.addFailAdminBotText: ❌ Error, your bots don't have administration rights in ${channelName} channel
channel.addFailNoBotsText: ❌ Error, at first you need to add at least one bot

help.title: Help
help.howToAddChannelText:
To add channel forward any message from it to this chat.

Bot will added if one of your bots is admin where.

Supports public and private channels.
help.howToAddBotText: To add bot forward message within bot token from @BotFather

admin.title: Admin panel
